meanings.sent1: I am psyched to go to the park with my friends.
meanings.sent2: She was psyched about the upcoming concert.
meanings.sent3: The kids were psyched to see the magician perform tricks.
meanings.sent4: The team was psyched up for the championship game.
meanings.sent5: The students were psyched for the surprise field trip.

meanings.sent1: He felt psyched and ready for the big presentation.
meanings.sent2: She was psyched to tackle the challenging project.
meanings.sent3: The athletes were psyched up for the intense competition.
meanings.sent4: The students were psyched like soldiers before battle.
meanings.sent5: The team was psyched and determined to win the match.

meanings.definition: To be mentally prepared or motivated.
meanings.sent1: I psyched myself up before the important interview.
meanings.sent2: She psyched herself to face her fears.
meanings.sent3: The team psyched each other up with encouraging words.
meanings.sent4: The students psyched themselves up for the final exam.
meanings.sent5: He psyched himself to take on the challenging task.
